K IM GOING TO WRITE THIS IN CAPS FOR ONE REASON AND ONE REASON ONLY. AND THATS BECAUSE SOME OF YOU GUYS PROBABLY WILL TRY TO SKIP OVER EVERY SINGLE COMMENT AND GO STRAIGHT TO ASKING YOUR QUESTION.

Q. CAN I PLAY THESE WITH AN EMULATOR? WHAT EMULATOR DID YOU USE?

A. NO YOU CAN NOT PLAY THESE WITH AN EMULATOR

Q. WELL IF I CANT PLAY WITHOUT AN EMULATOR THAN HOW THE HELL AM I GOING TO PLAY IT?

A. YOU BUY A FRIGGIN PSP. AND THEN YOU HACK THE S.O.B.

Q. ARE YOU RETARDED HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO DO THAT?

A. NO IM NOT RETARDED! USE THE FOLLOWING LINK TO PUT CUSTOM FIRMWARE ON YOUR PSP. AND DO ME A FAVOR AND READ THIS THING OVER A FEW TIMES BEFORE YOU SCREW UP YOUR PSP!

IF YOU PUT CFW ON YOUR PSP YOU WILL HAVE TO BUY A NEW BATTERY AFTER. AND DO NOT DOWNLOAD GAMES UNLESS YOU OWN THEM.

Q. ONCE I HAVE PUT CFW ON MY PSP. HOW DO I PLAY THE GAMES?

A. THERE SHOULD BE A ISO FOLDER IN YOUR ROOT FOLDER OF YOUR PSP. PUT THE .ISO'S AND .CSO'S IN THERE!

HERE YOU GO GUYS!
http://www.pspmod.com/forums/psp-hardware-guides/28839-easy-use-pandoras-battery-guide.html
HAPPY MODDING!
